text:
Image:Julia Ormond Cannes.jpg|thumb|Julia Ormond in 2008
Julia Karin Ormond (born January 4, 1965 in Surrey, England) is an English actress. She started in each movies, including "Nostradamus", "First Knight", "Legends of the Fall" and "Sabrina". She also starred on television shows, including "Nurse Jackie" and "Temple Grandin".
